pages.text: Holding Shift and Right Clicking with the $(5)Paint Bucket$(reset) in hand will open up a color GUI. You'll be able to make literally $(o)any$(reset) color under the sun.$(br2)The GUI also accepts $(5)Hex Codes$(reset).

pages.title: Holy Grail
pages.text: Right Clicking the $(5)Paint Bucket$(reset) on a block will recolor the block.$(br2)Holding Shift and Right Clicking on a block will copy the block color to your $(5)Paint Bucket$(reset).
